name: github-action-write-good
description: This action runs the `write-good` linter for English prose

scripts.prepare: ncc build index.js -o dist --source-map && TMP=$(mktemp -d) && ncc build node_modules/write-good/bin/write-good.js -o $TMP && mv $TMP/index.js dist/write-good.js && rmdir $TMP
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run prepare && npm run test

author: Jonathan Hartman <j@hartman.io>

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prepare && git add dist/
